body:
A package (`julia`) failed to build. I want to re-build from scratch, and say `spack clean julia`. This does not seem to do anything; the next `spack install julia` immediately stops with the same error message. The source and build directories are not deleted, and `make` resumes where it stopped earlier.

I expect `spack clean` to delete the left-over build directory.
title: "spack clean" does not work
